display.title: Phoenix Park
display.description:
This is the biggest park in Europe. I would recommend a visit at the zoo, then a nice tea or cake. There is a bike rental close to the park entrance and I think a bike is the best way to explore the park.

The American ambassador has a huge mansion in the middle of the park, similar looking to the white house. The Irish prime minister also has a house here. Another famous resident of the park are a bunch of deers, make sure not to miss them.
